about.title: About Me
about.section1: I am a software developer and a student of Systems Analysis and Development at the University of Passo Fundo (UPF), based in Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil. I specialize in creating full-stack web applications with dynamic interfaces, as well as developing back-end systems. I also enjoy building tools, such as CLIs and automations, that optimize my daily workflow and enhance my learning.
about.section2: I'm adaptable and committed to staying up-to-date with industry trends while maintaining a strong foundation in traditional, reliable technologies. Feel free to explore my work and get in touch — I'm always open to opportunities to learn and collaborate!
